chapters.title: The First Drop
chapters.epigraph: One drop carries a lifetime of stories.
chapters.content: Newborn screening collects heel-prick blood to detect treatable disorders. Residual spots require clear consent and governance.

chapters.title: Blood as Ledger
chapters.epigraph: The crimson scroll unfurls eternal codes.
chapters.content: Established: DNA encodes identity and health. Emerging: biophotons from cells. Speculative claims need rigorous evidence.

chapters.title: The Telomere Keystroke
chapters.epigraph: Length is a whisper; integrity is the song.
chapters.content: Telomeres shorten with division; telomerase maintains ends. Lifestyle and stress modulation correlate with telomere dynamics.
